name: Still Pond
description:
A game of relaxing, meditation and rhinoceroses.


The hit web game from Hamumu Games now available on your iPhone.


★ Restore stillness to the pond to unlock SURVIVAL mode and SCORE mode.
★ Six unlockable bonus levels!
★ Combos create score multipliers.
★ Enhanced graphics for Retina Display
★ GameCenter Leaderboards and Achievements (NEW!)

What players have to say about Still Pond:
------------------------------------------

"The game starts slowly, but all is not what it seems! Truly hilarious. You will play insanely until you win."
-- AtkinsSJ

"Loony! This game is insanity at its finest."
-- RyuInfinity

"Just wow. My 3rd favorite Hamumu game so far!"
-- Redbone

"Agh! Too frustrating to be fun."
-- BlastOfButter42

"Haha, This is Truly funny! If you are new to Hamumu, this should be one of your first games you play."
-- Kerma_
